docs.snippet: Argentina's debt default threatens to worsen trade tensions in South America, adding to the economic woes of Brazil in a tense election year and causing headaches in Uruguay as the Argentine economy looks likely to plunge deeper into recession.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina's debt default threatens to worsen trade tensions in South America, adding to the economic woes of Brazil in a tense election year and causing headaches in Uruguay as the Argentine economy looks likely to plunge deeper into recession.

headline.main: Argentine Default to Hit Brazil Factories, Uruguay Resorts
headline.print_headline: Argentine Default to Hit Brazil Factories, Uruguay Resorts

docs.snippet: Luis Suarez's appeal against a four-month ban for biting will be heard at the Swiss-based Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) on Aug. 8, a spokesman for his new club Barcelona said on Friday.

docs.snippet: The largest crowd to watch a soccer match in the United States - 109,318 - poured into Michigan Stadium on Saturday to see Manchester United beat Real Madrid 3-1 in a friendly.

headline.main: Record U.S. Soccer Crowd Sees Man United Beat Real Madrid

docs.snippet: Uruguay overran Hong Kong after a slow start to win their Rugby World Cup qualifier 28-3 in Montevideo on Saturday and will meet Russia over two legs for a place in the 2015 tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay overran Hong Kong after a slow start to win their Rugby World Cup qualifier 28-3 in Montevideo on Saturday and will meet Russia over two legs for a place in the 2015 tournament.

headline.main: Uruguay Beat Hong Kong, Meet Russia for World Cup Place

docs.snippet: The state is showing that legalization can work, though there are still kinks to be figured out.
docs.lead_paragraph: The state is showing that legalization can work, though there are still kinks to be figured out.
docs.abstract: Editorial asserts that Colorado is showing the country that legalization of marijuana can work; remarks how striking it is that marijuana industry has receded into normality in the state; notes that none of ominously predicted harms from legalization have come to pass (Series: High Time).

docs.snippet: The World Futsal Championships start Thursday, and an under-18 team from New York will participate. The sport is a smaller, faster version of soccer.
docs.lead_paragraph: The World Futsal Championships start Thursday, and an under-18 team from New York will participate. The sport is a smaller, faster version of soccer.
docs.abstract: New York Ecuador FC, an under-18 soccer team, plays a style called futsal, an import from South America; team is preparing to play in the World Futsal Championships; tournament has one adult division and seven youth divisions, with 64 teams from seven countries.

headline.main: For Young Soccer Players, Vast Ambitions Grow in Tight Spaces
headline.print_headline: Vast Ambitions Grow in Tight Spaces

docs.snippet: Italy and Juventus defender Giorgio Chiellini has joined the criticism of Italian football federation (FIGC) presidential candidate Carlo Tavecchio after the 71-year-old referred to African players as "banana-eaters."
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy and Juventus defender Giorgio Chiellini has joined the criticism of Italian football federation (FIGC) presidential candidate Carlo Tavecchio after the 71-year-old referred to African players as "banana-eaters."

docs.snippet: As South America's leaders met for a Mercosur summit in Venezuela, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe continued a whirlwind tour of the region this past week, hot on the heels of a visit by Chinese President Xi Jinping.
